summary: Unique Drelas' Cottage now Player's home.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5][color=#00ff00]Unique Drelas' Cottage[/color]

[/size][/b]I've found other [b][url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Drelas%27_Cottage#Drelas.27_Cottage]Drelas' Cottage[/url][/b] mods but I didn't satisfied.
Then I've created this one.Unique Drelas' Cottage now Player's home.

You can find at the south of Morthal.
Drelas now unaggressive and you can kill or stay together with him at home.

I've added player's bedroom and cellar.
More plants and more crops in the garden.

[url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Drelas%27_Cottage]All cupboards, dressers, and endtables in the location are non-respawning[/url]ï»¿.

Better furnitures, rugs and floor covering.
25 weaponracks and 10 weaponplacs in cellar.
Readingcorner with Bookshelves.Craftings.

[b][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/myaccount?tab=files]MY MODS
[/url][/size][/b]
author: cengo
